title: pankajAkSa tava
sahitya:
pankajAkSa tava.  rAgA:  tODi.  rUpaka tALA.  pankajAkSa tava sEvAm bahudAkara vAni


anupallavi

  shankara valashAsana mukha sandutOru kIrtE


caraNam 1    shrIdhara tava pAdukAm shirasA vahAni sAdhu tAlavrtEna samvIjayAni
    caraNam 2    sarasam samvAhayAni murahara tava caraNau karavi shvEta patra dharaNam tava shaurE
    caraNam 3    upaharANi tava samsphuradu ruta rakutukEna upakaraNAni ca hitAni sapadi padmanAbha
